posts.post_title: SOLD: 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplements - Joe McGinnity HOF RC (BGS 1)
posts.post_content:
Good Morning, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very scarce 1899-00 M101-1 Sporting News Supplements - Joe McGinnity HOF Rookie which has been graded a BGS 1 by the strict graders at Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scan of the item for condition details and please note that the back is clean. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
BUMP due to final price reduction.
